nodes.text: GXR-5 Sabotage Droid was a battle droid of the Galactic Republic active during the Cold War. In 3643 BBY it was aboard the Thranta-class corvette Brentaal Star during the attack by the Gage-class transport Black Talon. GXR-5 boarded the vessel, but was destroyed by the Imperials aboard.
GXR-5 Sabotage Droid appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the "Black Talon" flashpoint only if players choose the Dark Side option during their conversation with Captain Orzik, killing him.
